entry.title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a â­ï¸

entry.title: Chain of Evidence
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$1.99 â†’ $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $1.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$0.99

In-App Purchases

  • BÃ¼yÃ¼k AltÄ±n SandÄ±ÄŸÄ±ï¼š$1.99
  • Orta AltÄ±n SandÄ±ÄŸÄ±ï¼š$0.99
  • Mega AltÄ±n Hazinesiï¼š$4.99
  • KÃ¼Ã§Ã¼k AltÄ±n Ã‡antasÄ±ï¼š$0.99

Application Description

Truths don't stay in the dark... In this detective puzzle set among the streets, historical buildings, and dark secrets of Istanbul, each chapter awaits you to solve a new case. Evidence Chain is a gripping detective game that progresses chapter by chapter, where you interrogate suspects and piece together evidence to solve the mystery. At the heart of the game is a card-based interrogation system: Cross-examine witnesses, Gather information by scouring archives, Find traces with specialized tools, Expose suspects' inconsistent statements! Each chapter takes place in a different district of Istanbul: From the narrow streets of Galata to an old secondhand bookstore in KadÄ±kÃ¶y, new clues await you in a variety of mysterious locations.

entry.title: Controller for HomeKit
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Lifetime licenseï¼š$99.99 â†’ $49.99 [$49.99 ~ $99.99]

All Price Information

Priceï¼šFree

In-App Purchases

  • PRO yearly subscriptionï¼š$39.99
  • Lifetime licenseï¼š$49.99
  • Monthly Subscriptionï¼š$5.49
  • Yearly Subscriptionï¼š$19.99

Application Description

Experience and control your Apple Home in a whole new way with Controller for HomeKit. Our app combines all the familiar HomeKit features with numerous additional enhancements, offering you a user-friendly interface, unparalleled control, and flexibility. * FLOOR PLAN: Create a detailed floor plan of your home using the LiDAR sensor on your iPhone or iPad and control your HomeKit accessories directly through the floor plan. * COMPLEX AUTOMATIONS: Utilize advanced triggers and conditions for custom automations that are perfectly tailored to your needs. * NOTIFICATIONS: Create custom notifications to stay informed about important events in your home. * BACKUPS: Secure your setup and restore it easily when needed. * SMART FOLDERS: Organize your devices and automations effortlessly with smart folders and custom filters. * WORKFLOWS: Optimize your daily routines with workflows that go beyond the capabilities of Apple Home. * SETUP CODES: Securely store your HomeKit and Matter codes in the app, so they are always at hand and never lost. * MAINTENANCE: Keep track of your setup, quickly identifying which batteries need to be replaced, which devices are unreachable, or which automations are broken. * LOGS: Monitor all activities and changes in your smart home. * WIDGETS: Control your devices faster and easier with convenient widgets or quickly jump into your floor plan. Unlock the full potential of your smart home with Controller for HomeKit. Download the app now and experience how simple and intuitive home automation can be. For more information, visit our website: https://www.controllerforhomekit.com Privacy Policy: https://controllerforhomekit.com/privacy-en/ Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Application Screenshot

iPad

entry.title: Hyper Light Drifter
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$4.99 â†’ $2.99 [$2.49 ~ $4.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$2.99

Application Description

Finally, Heart Machine's award winning slash-'em-up arrives to iOS in the most polished and refined version yet, the Special Edition. â–º Winner of the Audience Award and Excellence in Visual Art awards of the prestigious Independent Games Festival. â–º 14 + nominations among the Best Visual Design, Best Audio and Best original Game categories. â–º 9/10 Destructoid - A hallmark of excellence. There may be flaws, but they are negligible and won't cause massive damage. â–º 9.5/10 Game Informer - The combination of soundtrack, art, and combat creates a rabbit hole worth your full exploration. â–º Eurogamer Recommended - Heart Machine's slash-'em-up is punishing and precise - and incredibly beautiful. â–º 9/10 GameSpot - It is more than simply pretty; Hyper Light Drifter uses its visuals to both guide and relax you. The grandest vistas calm your pulse between difficult, breathless combat sequences. â–º 8.5 Polygon - Hyper Light Drifter deftly mixes contemplative moments with breakneck action. â–º 5 Stars Darkstation - The top-down action-RPG Hyper Light Drifter is an amazing game: gorgeous, a fascinating world to explore, tight controls, beautiful music, and the faith in the player for you to figure things out on your own. Echoes of a dark and violent past resonate throughout a savage land, steeped in treasure and blood. Drifters of this world are the collectors of forgotten knowledge, lost technologies and broken histories. Our Drifter is haunted by an insatiable illness, traveling further into the lands of Buried Time, hoping to discover a way to quiet the vicious disease. Hyper Light Drifter is an action adventure RPG in the vein of the best 16-bit classics, with modernized mechanics and designs on a much grander scale. Explore a beautiful, vast and ruined world riddled with dangers and lost technologies. Features: â— 120 fps gameplay on iPad Pro / 60 fps on iPhone and iPad. â— Compatible with MFi controllers. â— Game Center achievements. â— Haptic Vibration. â— From each character to subtle background elements, everything is lovingly hand-animated. â— Easy to pick up, difficult to master; enemies are vicious and numerous, hazards will easily crush your frail body, and friendly faces remain rare. â— Upgrade weapons, learn new skills, discover equipment and traverse a dark, detailed world with branching paths and secrets abound. â— Evocative soundtrack composed by Disasterpeace. â— All the content from the original game + more weapons, enemies and areas from the Special edition.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Motorsport Manager 4
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Bundleï¼š$9.99 â†’ $4.99 [$4.99 ~ $9.99]

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$4.99

In-App Purchases

  • Bundleï¼š$4.99
  • Pre registration bundleï¼š$5.99
  • Premium livery bundleï¼š$5.99
  • Game Editorï¼š$5.99
  • Very Large Investmentï¼š$2.99
  • Large Investmentï¼š$2.99
  • Huge Investmentï¼š$4.99
  • Investmentï¼š$1.99
  • Chairman's Paymentï¼š$5.99

Application Description

MOTORSPORT MANAGER 4: MASTER RACE STRATEGY BUILD YOUR RACING DYNASTY Immerse yourself in the captivating journey of constructing your motorsport empire from the ground up, where every choice holds the key to your success. ASSEMBLE YOUR DREAM TEAM Hand-pick exceptional drivers and engineer a world-class racing powerhouse. Collaborate closely with drivers to secure pole positions and craft pitstop strategies that lead to race domination. REAL-TIME STRATEGY UNFOLDS Experience the adrenaline-pumping action of races in real-time or navigate through intricate strategy screens. Swiftly adapt to ever-changing weather, unexpected crashes, and the emergence of safety cars. UNLEASH VARIETY ON THE TRACK Embark on thrilling GT and Endurance racing adventures across six distinct championships. Immerse yourself in the iconic beauty of Monaco's settings, rendered in breathtaking artistry. DRIVERS TAKE CENTER STAGE Step into the shoes of promising new drivers, delve into their statistics, and cultivate pivotal relationships. Navigate the revamped HQ, seize upgrade opportunities, and master the new part development system for an immersive journey. YOUR JOURNEY, YOUR CHALLENGE Embark on a motorsport odyssey where every choice shapes your destiny. Witness dynamic AI team movements and adjust the difficulty level as the game evolves with you. SEIZE CONTROL, MAKE HISTORY It's your opportunity to rewrite the annals of racing lore and etch your name into the history of motorsport. Motorsport Manager 4 empowers you like never before.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Ghost Detector: Haunted Radar
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$0.99 â†’ Free [Free ~ $1.19]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šFree

Application Description

This app has a simple functionality: detecting the presence of spirits and capturing them. Once captured, it displays the Six Syllable Mantra from Eastern Buddhism as a form of protection and blessing for the user. â€¢ This application might scare you. â€¢ All sensors are on one page. â€¢ A real radar to track anomalies. â€¢ Highly accurate EMF (Electromagnetic Field) detector. â€¢ Take photos and detect anomalies within - can be freely turned on or off. â€¢ More detailed instructions are available in the app; simply touch the ? button to access them. Warning: If you are a very sensitive or easily scared individual, please consider not using this app and turning it off. Do not put yourself in danger while using this app. If you believe you are in danger, please close the app, contact someone for help, and leave the area immediately. Disclaimer: Please remember that we cannot guarantee the accuracy of any ghost detection since the app uses different sensors of the device, and thus it greatly depends on the terminal's precision and quality. Since supernatural activities cannot be scientifically proven, we cannot guarantee that the app communicates with real spirits. The results of this app cannot be scientifically verified.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad
